text: Akreavenek Island is one of the uninhabited Canadian arctic islands in the Kivalliq Region, Nunavut, Canada. It is one of several islands located within the mouth of Chesterfield Inlet. It is approximately from the Inuit hamlet of Chesterfield Inlet. ==References== Category:Islands of Chesterfield Inlet Category:Uninhabited islands of Kivalliq Region Category:Islands of the Canadian Arctic Archipelago
title: Akreavenek Island
